gov.nih.nlm.ling.transform

Interface DependencyTransformation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdverbialTransformation, CoordinationTransformation, DependencyDirectionReversal, DiscourseConnectiveTransformation, GenericSemanticsBinding, HyphenatedAdjectiveTransformation, ModifierCoordinationCorrection, NPInternalTransformation, PhrasalVerbTransformation, PolarityComposition, PPAttachmentCorrection, ScopeTransformation, TermCoordinationCorrection, VerbComplexTransformation

    public interface DependencyTransformation
    Interface to implement to define a new dependency transformation.

    Each dependency transformation takes in a Sentence object and transforms the embedding relations it has using a transformation rule. After each transformation rule is applied, the embedding relations associated with the sentence is expected to reflect the semantic dependencies of the sentence elements more precisely than before.

    Dependency transformations currently serve several purposes:

    • Semantically enrich the sentence.
    • Reflect the semantic dependencies to allow semantic composition.
    • Correct dependency parsing errors.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends DependencyTransformation>> getPrerequisites()
      Gets the dependency transformation rules that should have been applied before applying the current one.

      Transforms a Sentence object using the transformation rule.

    • Method Detail

      • getPrerequisites

        java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends DependencyTransformation>> getPrerequisites()
        Gets the dependency transformation rules that should have been applied before applying the current one.

        This is because the current rule assumes a dependency configuration generated by the prerequisite rule.

        Returns:
        the prerequisite dependency transformation rules, or empty list if no prerequisites

      • transform

        void transform(Sentence sent)
        Transforms a Sentence object using the transformation rule.
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to transform
